alldb.table_sql: SELECT t.ID as id, t.GPS_USER as gpsUser, t.CAR_NO as carNo, t.CHASSIS_NUM as chassisNum, t.SIM_NO as simNo, t.CAR_STATUS as carStatus, t.CAR_ADDR as carAddr, t.CAR_SPEED as carSpeed, t.CAR_PINWHEEL as carPinwheel, t.CAR_MILEAGE as carMileage, t.CAR_DATE as carDate, t.CAR_DIRECTION as carDirection, t.OFF_OR_ON as offOrOn FROM GPS_INTERFACES_INFO t
